div.bibl: Onze Toekomst, Sept. 23, 1910. DUTCH ANTI-SALOON LEAGUE

body.p: Next Wednesday evening, September 28, at eight o'clock, in the church of the First Reformed Congregation on Hastings Street, a meeting will be held by the Dutch Anti-Saloon League. Reverend P. Braak will speak on the destructive influence of the saloon.

Although the meeting of this League will be held in the church building of the First Reformed Congregation, this organization has neither a local nor an ecclesiastical character. Anyone who agrees with its principles, and has reached the age of eighteen, can become a member.
